description:
'''Short description:''' 
For the Baltic Sea- The DMI Sea Surface Temperature reprocessed analysis aims at providing daily gap-free maps of sea surface temperature, referred as L4 product, at 0.02deg. x 0.02deg. horizontal resolution, using satellite data from infra-red radiometers. The product uses SST satellite products from the ESA CCI and Copernicus C3S projects, including the sensors: NOAA AVHRRs 7, 9, 11, 12, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 , 19, Metop, ATSR1, ATSR2, AATSR and SLSTR.

'''DOI (product) :'''   
https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00156
title: Baltic Sea- Sea Surface Temperature Reprocessed
